reviewTitle: a lovely day with lovely people on a perfect boat trip !
review_details:
it was a lovely day on the boat. Anthi and her crew were incredibly friendly. The fish they caught was cooked very tasty. The atmosphere on the boat was great. Swimming in the sea! This trip is highly recommended to do .
It's definitely worth repeating .. at least we will do it !! :-) :-)

very friendly people, best place to eat,
the food is really delicous, prepared in a professional way ! we are going there more then once a holiday !
the best bar on in Perissa. The cocktails are delicious with everything necessary . Very friendly staff ! The prices are definitely affordable. The snacks are super delicious
